title: Program for Enhancing Online Scientific Inquiry Report Analysis Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Science inquiry report analysis training for professionals in a smartphone-based LMS environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain key information relationships in web-based science reports with 80% accuracy through text-graphic integration analysis.
Learners can write at least three analytical reports by converting scientific data between graphic and textual formats for application in their specialized field.
Learners can allocate over 75% of their focus time to core data using visual attention distribution strategies during online inquiry processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
